column5: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=niwF6TEsw5w  Found this footage that some might think is interesting.  Warning, some swearing

we have no idea how good we have it here sitting behind our computers reading fishing reports.  I sure hope we can get our men and women home safe as soon as possible!  Support our troups!!!!  Cheers!
I gotta wonder at the mental stabilty of the guy who volunteered to attack the enemy with the digicam.   TAKE THIS at 35 FPS and if you don't behave, I'll increase it to hi-res!
After watching a couple of those on utube, I noticed this address......lots more where the utube ones came from.  I had no idea we had UAV's.......  Candian Forces Combat Camera  Bill
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qaC-w2dIxZc...ted&search=  In case anybody thinks that the first link was play acting

My father went to Korea just after I was born and the first thing I can remember of him after he came home was him diving under the dining room table in Kingston yelling for us to get down when a plane went over the house.It wasn`t until years later while out hunting and being shot at by some idiot that I realized what stress he must have been under.  vance
